select q.count,d.day,q.type from d left join ( SELECT
DATE_FORMAT( order_start_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS day,
DATE_FORMAT( order_start_time, '%Y-%m' ) AS day,
sum(time)/count(driver_id) as count,'2' as type FROM ( SELECT driver_id, order_start_time,round( ( UNIX_TIMESTAMP( passenger_getoff_time ) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP( order_start_time ) ) / 60 ) AS time FROM tbl_order WHERE STATUS = 8
AND DATE_FORMAT( order_start_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begin}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT( order_start_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{end}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT( order_start_time, '%Y-%m' ) >= #{begin} AND DATE_FORMAT( order_start_time, '%Y-%m' ) <= #{end}
UNION SELECT driver_id, order_start_time, round( ( UNIX_TIMESTAMP( driver_arrived_time ) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP( order_start_time ) ) / 60 ) AS time FROM tbl_order WHERE STATUS = 9 AND driver_arrived_time IS NOT NULL
AND DATE_FORMAT( order_start_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begin}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT( order_start_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{end}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT( order_start_time, '%Y-%m' ) >= #{begin} AND DATE_FORMAT( order_start_time, '%Y-%m' ) <= #{end}
) t group by
DATE_FORMAT( order_start_time, '%Y-%m-%d' )
DATE_FORMAT( order_start_time, '%Y-%m' )
union select t1.day,count(t1.driver_id) as count,'1' as type from (SELECT driver_id
,DATE_FORMAT( order_start_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS day
,DATE_FORMAT( order_start_time, '%Y-%m' ) AS day
FROM tbl_order WHERE status >= 2 and status <= 8
AND DATE_FORMAT( order_start_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begin}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT( order_start_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{end}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT( order_start_time, '%Y-%m' ) >= #{begin} AND DATE_FORMAT( order_start_time, '%Y-%m' ) <= #{end}
)t1 group by day ) q on d.day = q.day
